item.title: Lake Michigan water temp drops 30+ degrees in day...

The cooler weather and a change in wind direction has dropped Lake Michigan water temperatures by as much as 30 degrees in some locations.  The National Weather Service says that the Ludington buoy which is four miles offshore recorded a water temperature of 41 degrees at midnight. At 3:00 p.m. Tuesday, the water temperature at that location was 73 degrees.
